name: ISO 7010 Icons
description:
ISO registers and lists recommended pictograms, which it calls "safety signs", on its website, ISO.org.


The ISO standard provides a registered number for pictograms that have officially been made part of the ISO 7010 standard.


Corresponding with the categories above, in ISO parlance, "E" numbers refer to Emergency (signs showing a safe condition), "F" numbers refer to Fire protection, "P" numbers refer to Prohibited actions, "M" numbers refer to Mandatory actions, and "W" numbers refer to Warnings of hazards.
